about_the_game:
Embark on an electrifying journey where roguelike strategy meets the thrill of tower defense. Deva - Rise of Demons invites you to a mythical island under siege, where your ultimate mission is to defend the sacred Energy Core at the heart of the battlefield. With waves of enemies surging from three distinct paths, you must harness your wits, strategy, and the unique powers of legendary heroes to secure victory.

Demo Content Overview for Deva - Rise of Demons

In this demo, you can select one of four heroes (Devas) to play: Vessavana, Ganesha, Amaterasu, or Vishnu. Each hero possesses unique skills and abilities, offering diverse gameplay experiences.

• Play One Island (Aetheris Sanctum): Battle through 10 enemy waves on this challenging island. Enemies will attack from three directions, with increasing difficulty as waves progress. At the final wave, face a powerful boss enemy to test your skills and strategies.

• Strategic Defense: Plan and prepare carefully to protect your towers and energy core from relentless assaults.

• Collect Experience Points: Enemies drop green energy orbs when defeated. Collect these to level up and enhance your hero’s abilities.

• Item Boxes: Randomly appearing item boxes provide valuable tools, such as damage boosts or health/mana regeneration, to aid in battle.

This demo gives you an exciting preview of Deva - Rise of Demons, showcasing core gameplay mechanics, strategic challenges, and unique hero abilities. Thank you for trying the demo and sharing your feedback!

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game, Deva - Rise of Demons, features content suitable for a mature audience, primarily due to its depiction of fantasy violence. Players will encounter battles against demonic creatures and mythical entities in an intense tower defense setting, with combat scenes involving weapons, explosions, and magical effects. While the violence is non-realistic and stylized, it may not be suitable for young audiences or those sensitive to combat imagery.

The game does not include any depictions of sexual acts, non-consensual behavior, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm. Our focus is on delivering an exciting and action-packed experience within a mythological and fantasy context.

Players sensitive to intense action and fantasy violence are advised to review this information before purchasing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Experience intense tower defense battles in Deva - Rise of Demons! Strategically place defenses, unleash powerful abilities, and battle demonic hordes in this action-packed game. Master unique heroes and items to defend your realm from destruction!
